item.title: Object clicking problems
item.dc:creator: @bloodymouth bloodymouth
item.description:
@bloodymouth wrote:

I cant make it so that when you click on an object it will do something. Like teleporting you or giving you items.
I’m using a Devolution(Dodian) based server. I have tried all the different ways to make an object do something under case 132 but nothing works. Can some one help me make it workif (objectID == 2488) { // Death Alter if (playerLevel[20] >= 65) { actionTimer = 5; resetPos(); teleportToX = 2606; teleportToY = 3102; heightLevel = 0; pEmote = 791; stillgfx(186, absY, absX); addItem(560, 25); addSkillXP(385, 20); sendMessage("You runecraft 25 Death runes."); } else { sendMessage("You need 65 or higher Runecrafting before you can make Death Runes!"); break; } }

if (objectID == 4152) { if (playerHasItem(8275)) { teleportToX = 2579; teleportToY = 9520; } else { sendMessage("You need a Sinister key to cross"); } }These are examples of what I have tried.

Read full topic
